Thera Sutta：1．Thera Sutta．-An Elder may be time-honoured，long gone forth，well-known，renowned，with a great following，a receiver of the requisites，learned，with a well-stored mind，but if he has wrong views and a perverted vision，he exists for the ill，the harm of devas and men．A．iii．114．



2．Thera Sutta．-Ten qualities，the possession of which will enable a monk to live happily and comfortably，wherever he may be．A．v．201．
